alert.note: Alert for Monroe; St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:48PM CDT until July 16 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MONROE AND ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... At 348 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dupo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Belleville, O`Fallon, East St. Louis, Fairview Heights, Cahokia, Swansea, Shiloh, Waterloo, Columbia, Mascoutah, Centreville, Lebanon, Freeburg, Caseyville, Dupo, Millstadt, New Baden, Scott AFB, Cahokia Parks Airport, and Oakville. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 12 and 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
